name: Pratyay Prasad Dhond
bio: Computer Engineering student. Still learning and exploring computer science's vast horizons! Questions/wanna talk? Connect with me!

links.name: Github - check out my second home XD
Youtube - I talk about books here <3
Join my Book Club on Discord

milestones.title: Currently Pursuing Computer Engineering!
milestones.description: Got admitted to COEP, Pune last October. A new Journey towards more learning and growing

milestones.title: Won HackSquad 2022 with #9 rank Globally!
milestones.description: 5 people | 1 team | 1 month. The team with the most quality-meeting open source contributions will prevail! That was hacksquad and me and my team 'Debug starts Here' won the event by coming in the top 10 teams.

milestones.title: Established my Book Club!
milestones.description: Reading can be tough! 80% of what you read can be summarised in 20% of the book. We do exactly that for you every 14 days, we select a book, summarise it live and have an interactive session on thoughts on the book and people's perspective. Learn more by sharing! Join now!

milestones.title: Quotation - Home for my Quotes!
milestones.description: Quotes are good right? But they get forgotten as quickly as they don't have a place to stay. That's when I got the idea, Quotation was my way of giving a home to all my(and perhaps people's) quotes. Making a website with people giving out the best quotes they have read and making it accessible to everyone through website interface.

milestones.title: Rehab - First Android app built in a Hackathon!
milestones.description: Developed an App within 36 hours during the event HackOdisha 2021. The app aims at helping teenagers and older individuals deal and get over their addiction to adult content

milestones.title: My first ever Hackathon - AnyoneCanCo.de
milestones.description: Built an online Self-Assessment test for Covid with a more User Friendly interface.

milestones.title: Built my First ever coding Project
milestones.description: Built a CLI program for 'savings account system' using C Programming. Start of my coding journey!!!
